For sale or trade is a Tom Downey Batting SC460OP PSA 6.  $700 delivered, PayPal f&f.  Would prefer to trade - looking for PSA 6 or 6.5 SC460 OP of the following: Happy Smith, Bell Follow Through, Bergen catching, Burch Fielding, Jordan Bat, Fred Payne, or Doc White Throwing.

Thanks!
Paul C
